title: Wallet 💼​
description: It is recommended to use Talisman, Subwallet,Novawallet, Polkadot.js, or Metamask. Since the token will be distributed on Astar, users will be asked for your EVM address . The token will also be active on AssetHub Polkadot, so a Substrate address will also be required if you wish to use that NETWORK.
